file_content.text: Don't let him win. Free yourself.
You're stronger than his influence. Fight!
Master Orgus... what happened?
The Emperor clouded your mind in darkness. Made you do terrible things.
You've been the Emperor's pawn a long time, but you're finally free.
The Emperor overpowered us. Master Braga, the others... we all fell. After that, nothing.
I only remember the fortress.
You were not yourself. What you did in the time of darkness is not your fault.
I've been under his control for days? Weeks?
How long was I out?
Time has less meaning for me than you. Long enough.
He enslaved my mind, like he did to Kira? I'll destroy him.
The Emperor will die.
Don't give in to emotion. It will consume you here.
You're still aboard the Emperor's fortress. The enemy is everywhere, but they think you serve them.
Keep your true nature secret. Find a way out. Your dark ally will help.
I'll play along until I can break free. Thank you, old friend.
I understand.
I have a friend here? Can't wait to meet him.
Who is my dark ally?
I don't need advice. Can't you just lead me out of here?
Some help you are.
The Force is with you again. Be strong....
Stop muttering to yourself, acolyte. Today we test your ability to extract information from the enemy.
Knowledge is power. Our enemies possess the secrets to their own annihilation. We must learn everything.
I'm ready for my lesson. Please instruct me.
[Play along] Yes, master.
Wait, aren't you holding me captive?
I'm not a prisoner?
You're confined to quarters until training is complete. You know this.
Aren't you even going to ask how I slept, master?
What, no hello?
Don't be an idiot. I'm not your master.
One of the scum you arrived with awaits interrogation. You'll conduct it while I watch.
Which particular bit of scum are you referring to? I came here with several.
[Play along] Who's the victim?
The Jedi girl. I understand she used to be one of us.
We're skipping straight to interrogations? I must be an advanced student.
Quite a test.
You've already proven yourself capable in combat situations.
They'll give up what they know, or die.
I look forward to it.
You aren't authorized for executions, yet.
Follow me. I'll instruct you in using the tormentor device.
I look forward to it. After you....
[Play along] Lead on, teacher.
You're the master of torment? I thought you'd be taller.
You don't impress me.
You'll see I'm a natural when it comes to inflicting pain.
I'll master it quickly.
